name: brave-real-launcher
description: Launch Brave Browser with the Devtools Protocol port open - supports all platforms including Linux x64/ARM64, macOS Intel/Apple Silicon, Windows x64/ARM64 with Xvfb support

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --declaration false --declarationMap false && node scripts/rename-cjs.cjs
scripts.test:compatibility: npm run test:esm && npm run test:cjs
scripts.test:cjs: node -e "const launcher = require('./dist/index.cjs'); console.log('CJS build works!')"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test

description: Launch Brave Browser with the Devtools Protocol port open - supports all platforms including Linux x64/ARM64, macOS Intel/Apple Silicon, Windows x64/ARM64 with Xvfb support
author: Brave Real Launcher Contributors
